subject: How to test Java Applet using JUnit or EMMA Code Coverage ?
msgSnippet: Hi, I m trying to do Code Coverage for Java Applet Code using EMMA / EclEMMA Tool, but I dont find much help regarding execution of Java Applets. Even I tried
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm trying to do Code Coverage for Java Applet Code using EMMA /
EclEMMA Tool, but I dont find much help regarding execution of Java
Applets.

Even I tried using JUnit to open an Applet, and do Code Coverage, but
nothing seem to work.

It would be great if anyone provide me some information on how to test
Java Applets using JUnit and do Code Coverage using EMMA.

Thanks in advance.

- Vivek
